title: Hi there, I’m Joe.
text:
I am a clinical scientist in genetics, working in the UK’s National Health Service.
I specialise in developing new genetic tests for rare diseases and cancer, and I love coding in R!
This website is a place to collate the stuff I work on and am interested in.

title: Lab Tests
text:
Description
This was a project to validate the SeqOne HRD test for ovarian cancer. This is the test that allows access to the drug olaparib. Until this project, samples were shipped to the USA for testing by Myriad Genetics.
